name: HematocritSelectedBloodSpecimens
title: Hematocrit, Selected Blood Specimens
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains terms related to the measurement of hematocrit, given in decimal form, from arterial, venous, capillary, or whole blood.),(Data Element Scope: ),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes hematocrit levels with property of volume decimal fraction and results in decimal fractions without units from arterial, venous, capillary, or whole blood.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes hematocrit levels in property (i.e., volume fraction) or in specimen types not listed under inclusion criteria (e.g., body fluid, csf).)
